title: Investigation of fluoride concentrations, water quality, and non-carcinogenic health risks of borehole water in bongo district, northern Ghana
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Gerheart Winfred Ashong, Boansi Adu Ababio, Edward Ebow Kwaansa-Ansah, Simon Konadu Koranteng, Gwalley Diyawul-Haqq Muktar
